assignments.utilization_method: Grip the handle close to one weight plate and swing the opposite plate downward to strike the target

physical_object.name: clear glass pepper grinder with a black lid

assignments.utilization_method: Wrap your hand around the main cylindrical body just below the black lid and swing it like a compact lightsaber hilt

physical_object.name: small green potted plant in a ribbed yellow ceramic pot

assignments.utilization_method: Spread fingers around the pot’s ribbed wall, squeeze gently, and lift the pot upward

physical_object.name: black hard-shell suitcase with top handle

assignments.utilization_method: Grab the suitcase’s top handle with one hand and shove or tug the whole case in a straight line on the floor

physical_object.name: blue upholstered bench seat with black metal frame

assignments.utilization_method: Stand beside the bench and brush along a flat section of the taut blue upholstery on the seat cushion
Grip the handle at mid-shaft with a precision grip and use the bristle end to execute fine wrist-driven painting motions

physical_object.name: green Lay's sour cream & onion potato chips bag, partially opened

assignments.utilization_method: Hold a loose section of the bag between thumb and middle finger and squeeze it repeatedly with the index fingertip to crinkle and release

physical_object.name: Arduino Uno microcontroller board with USB connector

assignments.utilization_method: Pinch the board’s sides so the thumb supports the back; press the index fingertip onto the small tactile reset button for each shutter click

physical_object.name: white minimalist desk lamp with red cord

assignments.utilization_method: Place one hand on the horizontal bar and the other on the vertical post, then rotate the horizontal bar downward or upward about 90° around the post to simulate valve turning

physical_object.name: 6-string cutaway acoustic guitar with light wood top and red sides

assignments.utilization_method: Slide your palm lightly along the smooth, curved side of the guitar’s body from the lower bout toward the neck

physical_object.name: wireless game controller with gray camouflage pattern

assignments.utilization_method: Turn the controller so its buttons face upward, rest your palm over the button cluster, and press downward clicking the underlying buttons
Cup the banana in one hand, squeeze gently along its length, and run your thumb along the peel
